summary: BULBASAUR PROGRESS PIC PLEASE! Tbh I'm obsessed with him and need to see progression until he is finished. Also, you are drop...
question: BULBASAUR PROGRESS PIC PLEASE! Tbh I'm obsessed with him and need to see progression until he is finished. Also, you are drop dead gorgeous and so talented 💜☺️
answer:
i’m cry 😭😭😭 thank you so much!!! come off anon & i’ll send you daily updates 😎

i’m actually working on him right now!!! was filling in with all of the light blue but i ran out :’( working on the eyes until i can get to michaels 😘

summary: Hey everyone! My friend posted a story she’s been trying to get on paper on AO3 finally! It would mean the world to her if you...
body:
Hey everyone! My friend posted a story she’s been trying to get on paper on AO3 finally! It would mean the world to her if you checked it out, maybe leave some constructive criticism.

It’s a Pokemon fanfic, and the couple is a crack pairing (Professor Sycamore x May) but she says that it’s because they look cute together or something, idk.

But yes! If you can, please check it out!

edit: Crap I forgot to post the link here it is! 

https://archiveofourown.org/works/18488881

summary: HEY GUYS, those who recognize this little guy probably already know whats up: I have to make a little test again :’D Before I...
caption:
HEY GUYS, those who recognize this little guy probably already know whats up: I have to make a little test again :’D Before I upload the next comic part, I want to know if tumblr allows me to link to other tumblr posts without kicking me out of the search results, so Im linking to my previous comic as a test!

Fingers crossed this works! :’D Meanwhile Joltik seems to get more and more comfortable with being used as a test-subject for my posts…HE IS DOING A GREAT JOB

summary: Kinda wondering... How long does sylveon's ribbons could stretch? One of my friend's sylveon could reach up to 10 meters. Is...
question: Kinda wondering... How long does sylveon's ribbons could stretch? One of my friend's sylveon could reach up to 10 meters. Is there any longer length?
answer:
“There’s the story of this one Sylveon who could stretch his ribbons up to 50 feet, but in my opinion that’s just a rumor.”

-Alex the Sylveon

reblog.comment:

tags: he was originally a sandile and we were good about Lizard Behavior but then we made him a dog in non-pokemon AUs and couldn't go back
not that he acts like a dog now that he's a different pokemon but we wanted a mammal to be more recognizably expressive

summary: Pokemon Card of the Day #1575: Mewtwo EX (Next Destinies)
title: Pokemon Card of the Day #1575: Mewtwo EX (Next Destinies)
body:
Mewtwo EX was one of the most hyped Pokemon cards to ever be released. It was selling for a similar price to what Luxray GL LV.X was at its peak… during pre-orders. Spending that much money on a new card was one heck of a gamble, and Mewtwo EX somehow managed to live up to all the expectations. Being a strong, bulky Pokemon that could fit into any type of deck would do that. While prices eventually went way down due to the release of a Mewtwo EX tin and other Pokemon EX gave plenty of competition, Mewtwo EX had all the tools to succeed for a very long time.

170 HP was pretty much expected for a Pokemon EX at the time, but that didn’t mean that it wasn’t bulky. This amount was high enough to take almost any hit, the exceptions being against other Mewtwo EX and various attacks such as from Rayquaza EX sometimes as well as Black Kyurem EX and some attacks with Virbank City Gym and Hypnotoxic Laser support. The fact that some of those boosts have to be mentioned shows just how far that HP went. Weaker attackers such as Vanilluxe needed a few turns to chip away. Mewtwo EX had a Weakness to Psychic, which just happened to mean other Mewtwo EX. Mewtwo EX mirrors were very common in the HGSS-On format. It was best to also bring along cards like Switch with Mewtwo EX if not running it alongside something like Eelektrik since 2 Energy was still a decent price to pay.

X Ball was fantastic. The cost was 2 Colorless Energy to deal 20 damage for each Energy on both Mewtwo EX and the Defending Pokemon. This could add up in a hurry, and since your opponent would need Energy to attack at some point, Mewtwo EX would hit 80-100 rather often. If you needed a bigger hit, you could add more Energy of any type, and Double Colorless Energy counted as 2 Energy for the purposes of this attack. Everything seemed to align for X Ball, and the attack was the biggest reason that Mewtwo EX was so dominant when it was first release as well as the reason for its continued success in various decks even after the game had caught up to its level of power.

Psydrive wasn’t as useful since it required 2 Psychic and a Colorless Energy to use and was therefore couldn’t just gel with any type of deck, but the attack was still very good. 120 damage for 3 Energy with a discard of only 1 was on a level comparable to Reshiram and Zekrom, for example. It was pretty nice if used in a deck using Psychic, Prism, or Blend Energy and if facing a low-Energy deck like Dusknoir/Accelgor.

Mewtwo EX had everything it needed to dominate the game at the start. It was as close as you could get to being required in an offensive deck for a while in the HGSS-On format. Darkrai EX showing up gave it some tough competition but it was still on the top of the game for the rest of the format despite that. Its dominance decreased in BLW-On and, even more so, in later formats it was allowed in due to re-releases, but any deck that wanted a splashable Psychic-type attacker still looked to Mewtwo EX. It was seen in competitive decks for the entire time. This was one case where a card really did live up to the hype.

Darkrai EX showing up gave it some tough competition but it was still on the top of the game for the rest of the format despite that. Its dominance decreased in BLW-On and, even more so, in later formats it was allowed in due to re-releases, but any deck that wanted a splashable Psychic-type attacker still looked to Mewtwo EX. It was seen in competitive decks for the entire time. This was one case where a card really did live up to the hype.

blog.name: pokemon-professor-sakura
blog.title: Asks: OPEN! Submissions: OPEN!
blog.description:
(This is a roleplay blog run by @chickadee567)

((Talking out of character))

Hello there! I’m Professor Sakura, and I’m always willing

to help trainers and caretakers with their Pokemon.

You can ask me about Pokemon behavior, where certain Pokemon can be found,

and even report sightings of rare or mythical Pokemon.

((Search for the tag #rules to find rules for asks and submissions!))

summary: The same anon for the Darkrai situation. I shined the light at it and quickly booked it since it used shadow ball. Luckily I...
question: The same anon for the Darkrai situation. I shined the light at it and quickly booked it since it used shadow ball. Luckily I managed to escape, thanks for the tips and I’m sorry if I troubled you!
answer:
It’s alright! I’m always happy to help.

- Professor Sakura
